bibl.title: Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008)
bibl.note: P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). - Techniques and Tools. - Workshop Practices. - Iconography. - "It is hard to accept the 'innuendo' that the drawings on our Papyrus might be a forgery as this ignores the technical, artistic and iconographical data from antiquity."
ADORNATO Gianfranco, Goya, Bramante and Others on P. Artemid.?

Kai BRODERSEN and Jaś ELSNER (Edd.), Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008) = Historia. Einzelschriften. 214 (Stuttgart, 2009) pp. 51-55.
